title: Germany hacked, media blames Russian group
text:
Germany hacked, media blames Russian group Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 01:09 
The German government says hackers breached its government computer network, but the situation has been brought under control. German media have reported Russian hacking group 'Crazy Bear', but those claims have been unconfirmed by German officials.   
The German government says hackers breached its government computer network, but the situation has been brought under control. German media have reported Russian hacking group 'Crazy Bear', but those claims have been unconfirmed by German officials.  //reut.rs/2oEQN2k
